title: My Kitch'n
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: My Kitch'n opened this casual, neighborhood restaurant in the Batignolles area in October 2014 (and shut its original cafe in the market in early-2015). The menu is vegan and organic and features items like veggie sandwiches, sushi burrito, salad, hot dogs, and risotto. Serves beer and organic wine, bespoke cocktails with a personal twist.
